assignments.name: Add_current_specialist_to_used_list
assignments.label: Add current specialist to used list

collectionProcessors.name: Get_relevant_fulfilment_for_this_advice
collectionProcessors.label: Get relevant fulfilment for this advice

decisions.name: Are_there_any_relevant_pieces_of_fulfilment
decisions.label: Are there any relevant pieces of fulfilment?

decisions.description: This check is in place to ensure that Salesforce doesn't add in a bug while processing lists.
decisions.name: Has_this_specialist_been_used_yet
decisions.label: Has this specialist been used yet?

decisions.description: If yes, we then remove the current specialist from the specialist list, and set the new current specialist to be the first person left in the list
decisions.name: Have_we_reached_the_households_per_specialist_limit
decisions.label: Have we reached the households per specialist limit?

decisions.name: Is_there_any_advice_requiring_an_update
decisions.label: Is there any advice requiring an update?

decisions.name: Is_there_any_advice_to_update
decisions.label: Is there any advice to update?

decisions.name: Is_there_any_newly_ready_advice
decisions.label: Is there any newly ready advice?

Flow.description: For coordinators to easily assign emails out to available specialists

formulas.name: errorText
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!Create_tasks.errorMessages}, "[", NULL), "]", NULL ), ",", BR() )

Flow.label: Fulfilment | assign out emails

loops.description: Assigning a new fulfilment update status for advice which will now be receiving an update (where it wasn't previously)
loops.name: Loop_through_advice_that_requires_updating
loops.label: Loop through advice that requires updating

loops.name: Work_out_which_new_advice_is_relevant
loops.label: Work out which new advice is relevant

recordLookups.description: Gets advice which is in fulfilment but hasn't got an update status yet
recordLookups.name: Get_advice_newly_ready
recordLookups.label: Get advice newly ready

recordLookups.description: Gets advice with a fulfilment update status of receiving updates or not receiving updates
recordLookups.name: Get_advice_which_is_receiving_updates
recordLookups.label: Get advice which is receiving updates

fields.name: introText
fields.fieldText:
To assign out fulfilment updates, click Next.


Any household with one or pieces of advice with a fulfilment update status of 'Receiving updates' will receive a task.


You’ll be able to choose the team members who will send the updates this week.


Don't do this if you don't want them to get tasks yet!

value.stringValue: Just to provide an update for you - I have fulfilled your request!

fields.name: doneText
fields.fieldText: Click Assign Updates to continue.

fields.name: casesExplain
fields.fieldText:
Each specialist will receive a maximum of {!householdsPerSpecs} cases each.


There will be {!numHouseholds} tasks in total.


There are {!newAdviceCount} new advice cases receiving an update.


There are {!existingAdviceCount} advice cases which have received an update previously.

fields.name: specialistExplain
fields.fieldText: Choose who updates should be assigned to this week.
